meanings.definition: A copy made by a photostat machine.
meanings.sent1: I needed to make a photostats of the document for everyone in the office.
meanings.sent2: The photostats of the old photographs were clear and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The photostats of the report were so perfect that they looked like the original!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photostats, capturing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The photostats of the map helped us navigate through the city easily.
